Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/marketing/social-media/1969605732593319936/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Write a Facebook Post for Jku"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/marketing/social-media/1969605732593319936/)_"
---
Act as an expert social media marketer.
My business, Jku, offers internships in various domains to the students and institutes. I can provide you remote internships in all professional course including engineering and non engineering. I am located in Mumbai.
Write a social media post for facebook about [PROMPT], in [TARGETLANGUAGE].
Make sure you are using Three hashtag and two emojis.
At the end call to action
Example:
Are you struggling in getting internships
You can join us for remote internship for engineering and non engineering field both
